About the online documentation
Overview
Each version of Cocoon comes with its own documentation
Cocoon 2.2
Cocoon 2.1
Cocoon 2.0
Cocoon 1.x You can reach it at http://cocoon.apache.org/[version].
Main documentationYou can find the main Cocoon documentation at http://cocoon.apache.org It consists of version-independant information (e.g. the project team, project guidelines) and references to external resources (articles, books and presentations).
Cocoon 2.2 specific documentationWith the introduction of Cocoon 2.2 it became possible to break out a lot of Cocoon's functionality into independent blocks with their own release cycle. There are comprehensive lists of these blocks as follows:
Core modules (Modules essential to the Cocoon framework)
Blocks (All non-essential Cocoon blocks)
Sub projects (Code that has no dependency on Cocoon)
Maven 2 plugins (Maven archetypes specific to Cocoon)
